text: OMG just felt a huge shake in Shinjuku! üò± My coffee spilled everywhere. Train stopped. #earthquake #Tokyo
OFFICIAL ALERT: Magnitude 6.8 Earthquake detected in Tokyo Prefecture. Residents advised to secure exits and stay calm. JMA.
BREAKING: Massive structural fire reported at a high-rise in downtown Chicago. Firefighters on scene.
I can see flames coming out of the 20th floor! Hope everyone gets out safely. #ChicagoFire
Anyone else stuck at Shinjuku station? Lights are flickering and elevators are down. #TokyoQuake
Breaking: Water logging reported in Dadar, Mumbai. Traffic moving slow at T.T. Circle. Avoid low lying areas.
Mumbai Police: Heavy rains expected to continue. Please stay indoors unless necessary. #MumbaiRains
My basement in Dadar is completely flooded! üåä Need help moving furniture. This rain is insane.
Emergency broadcast: Bushfire out of control near Katoomba, Blue Mountains. Residents in Echo Point sector evacuate IMMEDIATELY east via Great Western Hwy.
Can see the smoke from Leura. The sky is orange. Stay safe everyone in Katoomba! #nswfires
Fire crews are battling strong winds in the Blue Mountains. Visibility is near zero on the highway.
SENSOR_NET: High water levels detected at Ocean Drive sensor 4B. Value: 1.2m above normal. Potential storm surge.
Hurricane Warning: Miami Beach residents should complete preparations. Tropical storm force winds expected within 2 hours.
Partying on Ocean Drive before the storm hits! üçπ Just kidding, boarding up windows now. Stay safe Miami!
Live cam shows lava fountains visible from Grindavik. Blue Lagoon is being evacuated as a precaution.
Iceland Met Office: Eruption fissure has opened north of Grindavik. Lava flowing south. Code Red for aviation.
Just landed at Keflavik and pilot says we might be stuck here. Can see the glow from the volcano! üåã #Iceland
Aid convoy unable to reach Lodwar due to road conditions. Drought situation critical in Turkana.
We need water in Turkana! Wells are dry. Livestock is dying. Please send help. #KenyaDrought
Flash Report: Landslide has blocked the railway line to Machu Picchu near Cusco. Tourists stranded.
Stuck on the train to Machu Picchu. Rocks covering the tracks. Everyone is safe but we are not moving. #Peru
Tsunami sirens sounding in Valparaiso! Everyone heading to the hills. This is not a drill.
